title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2 more lots of LIFO fun!!LOT 1: 15x 2013 Bitcoin Suisse Series 1 Non-Denominated notes*Notes are not loaded*These were the 2nd lowest mintage of the first seriesLOT 2: 12x 2013 CryptoVest Special First Edition coins*Only 850 assembled of this version out of 4000 produced*Coins are not loaded*Some coins do have tarnish*Comes with COA as seen below*Coin numbers available: 315,335,337,345,696,728,732,735,746,747,754,757AUCTION RULES*Bids should be placed as follows for each lot: 1 @ 0.0001BTC, 2 @ 0.0001BTC, etc up to maximum amount per LOT***Bidders can still bid the same amount as another bidder on a lot as long as the the amount of coins bid upon does exceed the lot size*****Winners will select which notes/coins they want in order of win for each lot***STARTING BID PER NOTE/COIN PER LOT: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER NOTE/COIN PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 14th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Question : are the note in lot #1 already set up with public and hidden private keys ? Or are the DIY ?  Thank you

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on August 09, 2023, 04:49:37 PMQuestion : are the note in lot #1 already set up with public and hidden private keys ? Or are the DIY ?  Thank you That is a good question. Apologies for the picture above not being the best... but here is a better view of one of the notesThey all come with a pre-generated key set with the public address being in the middle front of the note and then the private key being behind a peel-to-reveal strip further down.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Interesting, I don’t see a hologram on it. Are you saying the private key is under a white peel sticker where the red arrow points to it?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on August 10, 2023, 04:56:41 AMInteresting, I don’t see a hologram on it. Are you saying the private key is under a white peel sticker where the red arrow points to it?Correct.There is a "hologram" of the "B" on the right middle of the note... appears black in the picture above

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on August 10, 2023, 11:57:05 AMQuote from: rsincognito on August 10, 2023, 04:56:41 AMInteresting, I don’t see a hologram on it. Are you saying the private key is under a white peel sticker where the red arrow points to it?Correct.There is a "hologram" of the "B" on the right middle of the note... appears black in the picture aboveokay I get it now, thank you for explaining this to me.im in lets bid:Lot 1: 4 @ 0.005
